string-array.name: report_message
string-array.item: "Thank you for stepping up as Block Captain."
"Let's confirm that you and your household are safe."

string-array.name: walkthrough_message
string-array.item: "Complete this step before checking on individuals."
"First, see that it is safe to leave your home."
"Take a short walk through your block and observe."

string-array.name: medical_message
string-array.item: "Good work. Now let's check on block members."
"Avoid offering help until each house has been visited."
"Tell members you are gathering information for emergency services."

string-array.name: submit_message
string-array.item: "Review your findings and submit when ready."
